overview: Toronto, Canada, 1899. William Lyon Mackenzie King (1874-1950) fervently believes that he is destined to become Prime Minister, but to do so he will first have to fight his personal obsessions and overcome the many obstacles he will encounter on his tortuous path to power.
tagline: Blistering shame! Unbridled passions! Pulse-quickening tribulation!
title: The Twentieth Century
